drupalNodeEvent.title: Walking the Cat Back: Why Social Scientists Misunderstood Chinese Politics (Professor Joseph Fewsmith discusses his new book, Rethinking Chinese Politics)

field_speakers.processed: Professor Joseph Fewsmith, Boston University Pardee School of Global Studies

field_organizers.processed: Boston University Center for the Study of Asia

field_description.processed: In person at 121 Bay State Road; via Zoom (RSVP to receive a Webinar link)
